title: Syndra VS Ryze: Who would win?
body:
https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7JaI9PDWSrs/V3LMuwJqlFI/AAAAAAAAQ5o/PJRSBMYtPvgns0JsedZx0cR2J53CkeRowCLcB/s1920/ryze-splash-1-wallpaper.jpg  VS http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/8/8c/Syndra_OriginalSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160522021251

Both are powerful archmages in their own right, but I've wondered who would win in a mage battle.

Would Syndra's massive raw power give her the victory, or would Ryze's superior knowledge of magic period and his wizened experience give him an edge?

Speaking lore-wise, not from gameplay.

replies.body:
Even if Syndra is more powerfull than Ryze... I see her as an arrogant, overconfident and inexperienced girl who would underestimate her opponents.

So, i guess that Ryze would take advantage of that, and win since he has more experience and knowledge.
I'm just gonna say ryze because he is my old main.
100% ryze. He posses more than two world runes. These have the potential to delete everything faster than i would delete yasuo. "in an instant, all could be gone" -Ryze

But he wouldn't use them.

I mean Ryze killed his master,because said master used the world runes to fight against the icathians.
Thanks for the opinion. Epic necro tho. :P
I'd say Syndra has more raw power, but Ryze can abuse what she doesn't know since ryze has been around for like 9 billion years or something
Ryze has way more mastery over magic than Syndra, I don't see him losing to her.

I'd say Ryze as well.
Though in the end it'll depend on the situation,because Syndra outclasses him when it comes to raw magical power.
Ryze is a lot more experienced in magic

Depends on when I think if Ryze fought Syndra just after calming down from being freed he would beat her and it would all be about how much control Syndra has over her power something tells me if Ryze had to he probably has Runes to use Syndra's crazy levels of power against her.

Syndra, definitely. Ryze knows a lot of magic and knows what kind of magic would be against others. But Syndras raw use and primal execution of her magic is something he would just be overwhelmed with the fact that she DOES have more power. Limitless potential.

Hey!

Don't worry I have not forgotten about the fic, I just ran head first into writer's block.

I will be up and running soon though.
Lol, don't worry about it. Quality over quantity anyhow. I love Syndra's lore so I came to join this conversation haha. Wee bit bias I admit.
as she is in the lore, ryze would win.  if stndra actually tried to practice controlling her abilities she would eventually be able to beat him with ease

Ryze. Syndra is still learning what she is capable of and learning in general. Ryze has been in the game awhile and if you ask me has heard of syndra and studied her in some way. Ryze would be able to pin point weaknesses syndra has.
